name: Basketball Puzzles
description: Basketball Puzzles is a physic-based puzzle game where you have to use one ball which you drag around to shoot the other ball (the basketball) into the goal. There are twelve different levels with unique obstacles and twists that makes it harder to shoot or bounce the basketball into the goal. Some levels are more difficult than others, and therefore it might take some time before you manage to complete them, but all levels are possible.
